alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Logan and southwestern Gove Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Monument to 8 miles south of Russell Springs. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Logan and southwestern Gove Counties, including the following locations... The Monument Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for west central Kansas.
